extendedInfo.description: Lightweight reference and Quiz of french departments, their code, their region, their prefecture.This is not an extensive database, just a reference light-enough to stay on your phone, and a few Quiz to make learning more fun.1.7 - added Prefecture Quiz, fix Region Quiz***Note: Samsung Galaxy S not supported***

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is good, but the makers haven\'t mastered the map bit yet. Apart from that it\'s OK. Get it if you go to france and are inquisitive of where all the cars come from etc.
reviews.author: Jeremy Hill

reviews.comment: As tourist in France, I love it! Possible improvements: - after entering code, I have to press menu button twice to see map - support pan/click on map
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok. Pourrait avoir une recherche pas nom (pour non fran\303\247ais)
reviews.author: A Google User
